product_title: Little Me Baby-Boys Newborn Elephant Footie
review_body: One of the best onesies. Not too thick or too thin. Sizes allow room for baby to grow.

product_title: Vaenait Baby Toddler Kids Girls Boys Wearable Blanket Sleeper Zipup Cloud
review_body: Great. NIce cotton material, and love the footies so he can walk around in it. Price is right.

product_title: Hudson Baby Unisex 3 Pack Long Sleeve Bodysuits
review_body: Very soft, fits well. We had it for several months now and it still looks brand new and did not loose shape or color after multiple washes.

product_title: Hudson Baby Unisex 3 Pack Long Sleeve Bodysuits
review_body: These little onsies are perfect!! They are made well and fit great...with growing room. The colors are vivid and did not fade when washed. The little appliances are so cute!

product_title: Hudson Baby Unisex 3 Pack Long Sleeve Bodysuits
review_body: These are some of the softest and cutest onsies in my son's wardrobe. The colors are so bright and the designs so cute, he looks adorable in them

product_title: Leveret Footed "Striped Baby Boy" Pajama Sleeper 100% Cotton (Size 6M-5T)
review_body: Perfect onsies with feet that actually come in sizes for 12 M +. Quality material and feet have grippers. They've gone through several washings and color and material is holding up great.

product_title: Leveret Footed "Striped Baby Boy" Pajama Sleeper 100% Cotton (Size 6M-5T)
review_body: The pajamas fit perfectly, but I thought they were a little thin especially since my little guy cannot use a blanket yet.

product_title: Luvable Friends Unisex Baby Gowns, 3-Pack
review_body: I love these sleep gowns! I bought two sets of these because they are absolutely perfect for sleeping and are so adorable! The material is wonderful for maintaining baby's temperature as it is super breathable. I didn't know until I used these that the sleeves have little caps on the end to your cover baby's hands if they tend to scratch themselves, or you can keep them unfolded and let baby reach and grab as he pleases! These make nighttime changing super easy and the size is great. They are a bit too large for brand-new babes but after only a few weeks they should be fine and fit all the way up to 6+months (depending on your little one of course!)

product_title: Zutano Unisex-Baby Newborn Cozie Fleece Bootie
review_body: A must have for any baby. Stay on well. We used ours every single day. Wash easily with laundry. No problems what so ever.

product_title: Zutano Unisex-Baby Newborn Cozie Fleece Bootie
review_body: It's the best booty everrr!! My son has chunky breastfeed baby feet and this stays on without being too tight.. Love it and could easily buy three more.

product_title: Touched by Nature Baby Organic Cotton Bodysuits, 3 Pack
review_body: Nice and thick cotton. Very soft but a little bigger than expected (which is ok in the long run).

product_title: Touched by Nature Baby Organic Cotton Bodysuits, 3 Pack
review_body: They are perfect for summer night sleeping (home temp around 72) along with footsie pants. They are soft and cute and do not shrink. I dry mine at regular heat setting. Before the first wash I dried them for 1 hr at regular heat, and none of the embroidery bled.

product_title: Touched by Nature Baby Organic Cotton Bodysuits, 3 Pack
review_body: Fit to be determined as this is a pre-birth gift.  But I LOVE the quality, look, feel of these cute "onesies".  They brought a smile to the first-time expectant parents' faces!!'

product_title: Touched by Nature Baby Organic Cotton Bodysuits, 3 Pack
review_body: I love these!!  No bleeding problems and they are so soft and stretchy!

product_title: Amoureux Bebe 100% Cotton white Baby and toddler Camisole Onesies bodysuits with lace.
review_body: So adorable, soft, and comfortable. Straps stay on. Love it and my little one was cool and comfortable.

product_title: Amoureux Bebe 100% Cotton white Baby and toddler Camisole Onesies bodysuits with lace.
review_body: Super Cute Onesie! Fit just right and my baby looks adorable in it. Soft and cute!

product_title: Amoureux Bebe 100% Cotton white Baby and toddler Camisole Onesies bodysuits with lace.
review_body: Bought this onesie for my daughter to wear under her baptism dress. It was perfect. Fit her great. I will be buying more.

product_title: Amoureux Bebe 100% Cotton white Baby and toddler Camisole Onesies bodysuits with lace.
review_body: True to size. Simple and cute.  Perfect under dresses. Straps do not show. Very thin. Does not add warmth. But perfect for warm weather layering or to just wear under any dress.  Will def purchase more as my daughter grows.

product_title: Amoureux Bebe 100% Cotton white Baby and toddler Camisole Onesies bodysuits with lace.
review_body: I bought this for my granddaughters baby baptism. It arrived in a timely manner, was of excellent quality, fit perfectly, and was quite reasonably priced. It was special for the baptism because of the lace trim. It was worn under her baptism gown but at the restaurant her mom removed the gown and she was in her lace trimmed onesie for a bit, and was still very special.

product_title: BON BEBE Baby-Girls Newborn Flowers Sleeveless Sundress
review_body: Precious. I added a white onsie under for shoulder protection. Looks adorable. Washes perfectly.

product_title: Carters White Sleeveless Bodysuit Onesies
review_body: Soft and perfect as an undershirt. Helps for layering in winter and light enough for use in summers as well. Provides a good protection from spit ups etc. Love it!

product_title: Carters White Sleeveless Bodysuit Onesies
review_body: These onesies are perfect for layering! My baby girl wears them almost every day. They are super soft and wash well, too. I also think they are true to size.

product_title: Disney Cuddly Drop Needle Bodysuits, 3 Pack
review_body: These are nice, soft, high-quality baby bodysuits that fit my daughter very nicely. We used them under her clothes in the chilly autumn and winter weather and couldn't have been happier. It's really nice to have the option to size them up between the legs. We were able to get a few extra weeks out of them thanks to this option.

product_title: NEWBORN 3 pack of Baby boy or girl leg warmers
review_body: so cute! keeps babylegs warm and can stay on during diaper changes, which is nice

product_title: NEWBORN 3 pack of Baby boy or girl leg warmers
review_body: Adorable! Great for breast feed babies that need to be changed often!

product_title: NEWBORN 3 pack of Baby boy or girl leg warmers
review_body: Love the colors. They look great on my newborn. She is tiny still the fit was tight.

product_title: Carters White Sleeveless Bodysuit Onesies
review_body: Great product the material is 100% cotton and I love it Now ordering a bigger size since my boy is growing so fast.

product_title: Bumkins Unisex-baby Newborn Dr. Seuss Thing 2 Short Sleeve Bodysuit
review_body: Very good material , fitting and overall i like it a lot. No stretching or shrinking after a wash problem. Happy with the purchase.

product_title: Bumkins Unisex-baby Newborn Dr. Seuss Thing 2 Short Sleeve Bodysuit
review_body: Of course it arrived on time. I love that it doesn't look cheap. The material is nice and thick and the colors are vibrant, even after washing. <3

product_title: Luvable Friends Unisex Baby Gowns, 3-Pack
review_body: I love these sleep gowns! They are super cute and the material is wonderful for maintaining baby's temperature as it is super breathable. I didn't know until I used these that the sleeves have little caps on the end to your cover baby's hands if they tend to scratch themselves, or you can keep them unfolded and let baby reach and grab as he pleases! These make nighttime changing super easy and the size is great. They are a bit too large for brand-new babes but after only a few weeks they should be fine and fit all the way up to 6+months (depending on your little one of course!)

product_title: Luvable Friends Unisex Baby Gowns, 3-Pack

product_title: Luvable Friends Unisex Baby Gowns, 3-Pack
review_body: While they are a bit large for a newborn, if they weren't,  then tthey wouldn't fit later. These are easy to put on, really cute, and super soft! Love them!

product_title: Luvable Friends Unisex Baby Gowns, 3-Pack
review_body: These are super soft and really cute.  The sizing was 0-6 months and they definitely appear to be for "growing into",  I wanted these for that early stage when there are soooo many diaper changes at night but they will be really big on a newborn baby (0-3).

product_title: Luvable Friends Unisex Baby Gowns, 3-Pack
review_body: This was a gift for a baby shower so I do not know how it will fit the unborn, but the mother-to-be was thrilled with the outfits.  They are not too heavy so they will be comfortable for the hot weather we have.  Very pleased.

product_title: Disney Cuddly Pointelle Bodysuit (3-Pack)
review_body: Soft and cuddly feeling! Perfect fit and love that they can be adjusted for length.

product_title: Leveret Footed "Striped Baby Boy" Pajama Sleeper 100% Cotton (Size 6M-5T)
review_body: Beautiful pjs! Great material! I love the snug fit and the colors. It is fun and adorable.

product_title: BON BEBE Unisex-Baby Newborn My Cute Friends Wearable Blanket
review_body: We bought this because it had sleeves and we wanted a sleep sack that we wouldn't have to use an outfit underneath (so she won't over heat). Only complaint is that with the buttons she's able to get a foot out in between the buttons.

product_title: Leveret Long Sleeve 4-pack Striped Baby Girls Bodysuit 100% Cotton (Size 0-24 Months)
review_body: these are very soft jersey. vibrant cute colors. fit nicely all around. have washed several times and they are holding up well with minimal shrinkage and no fading yet that ive noticed. will def get the next size up when time. we are a healthy 3 mths \ 14 lbs

product_title: Leveret Long Sleeve 4-pack Striped Baby Girls Bodysuit 100% Cotton (Size 0-24 Months)
review_body: Comfortable fabric, fits well, and washes well. I like these a lot.

product_title: Leveret Long Sleeve 4-pack Striped Baby Girls Bodysuit 100% Cotton (Size 0-24 Months)

product_title: Spasilk Unisex Baby 100% Cotton Sleeveless Lap Shoulder Bodysuits (Pack of 3)
review_body: Great for layering under shirts that don't snap. Provides an extra layer of warmth in the winter. Sizing is fairly accurate, but they seem to run slightly short/wide.

product_title: Zutano Unisex-Baby Newborn Cozie Fleece Bootie
review_body: These are warm, cozy, stay on, and fit over a wide range of sizes. I have now bought a few pairs for my baby and as gifts.

product_title: Zutano Unisex-Baby Newborn Cozie Fleece Bootie
review_body: These booties wear and wash well. They really do stay on my baby's feet so much better than socks! Measure your baby's foot before ordering, and visit the Zutano website to view their size chart before ordering. My baby is 3 months and the 6 month fit with some room to grow. They're pricey, but if you buy a couple pairs they are truly all you need, esp in the cold weather. Socks on babies are useless. They just kick them off!

product_title: Leveret Short Sleeve 4-pack Variety Boys Bodysuit 100% Cotton (18-24 Months)
review_body: Bodysuits are cute and soft, but shrunk a full size after washing in cold water and drying on low. Order a size up to account for shrinkage.

product_title: Zutano Unisex-Baby Newborn Cozie Fleece Bootie
review_body: Perfect for little ones. Easy on and off and seem super cozy..

product_title: Zutano Unisex-Baby Newborn Cozie Fleece Bootie
review_body: Love these! Perfect for baby who likes to pull off socks. Super comfy. Easy wash.

product_title: Zutano Unisex-Baby Newborn Cozie Fleece Bootie
review_body: These booties are great - they stay on really well and there are 2 snaps so you can tighten/loosen as needed!

product_title: Zutano Unisex-Baby Newborn Cozie Fleece Bootie
review_body: The BEST baby booties!  they stay on and feet stay cozy!

product_title: Zutano Unisex-Baby Newborn Cozie Fleece Bootie
review_body: Best booties ever.Soft, warm, stays on (unlike socks which constantly fall off)We love love love these booties and got a second pair so that we could put then in the wash and still have a pair to go out in every day.

product_title: Zutano Unisex-Baby Newborn Cozie Fleece Bootie
review_body: These are the only socks/booties you need for your pre-walking baby!

product_title: Leveret 4-pack Solid White Long Sleeve Bodysuit 100% Cotton (0-24 Months)

product_title: Leveret Footed "Striped Baby Girl" Pajama Sleeper 100% Cotton (Size 6M-5 Years)

review_body: Fabric is stiffer than other Carter's bodysuits, but softens after a couple washes. The neck hole (even with snaps undone) is smaller than same-sized Carter's bodysuits (and my kid has a huge head, so he outgrew them fast).

product_title: Leveret Footed "Striped Baby Boy" Pajama Sleeper 100% Cotton (Size 6M-5T)

product_title: Leveret Footed "Striped Baby Boy" Pajama Sleeper 100% Cotton (Size 6M-5T)

review_body: These are the softest little booties ever. They were perfect for my newborn. Kept his socks on and his feet warm!

product_title: Gerber Baby-Boys Infant One-Piece Boy Thermal Unionsuit
review_body: Love that these aren't footie pajamas! We have hardwood floors and our son is learning to walk and would fall a lot with the footie pajamas. These work great, they're breathable material, and love the designs!

product_title: Gerber Baby-Boys Infant One-Piece Boy Thermal Unionsuit
review_body: A nice termal fabric, perfect to be wear in a hot night!

product_title: Leveret Long Sleeve 4-pack Striped Baby Girls Bodysuit 100% Cotton (Size 0-24 Months)
review_body: I needed some long sleeve onesies for my five month old baby to sleep in at night. Now that it's warmer weather full on footie pajamas are a little too warm to wear under her wearable blankets, but she still needs her arms covered at night. These are perfect! And the fabric is so soft! I bought the 6-12 month size and they are a little big on her now but that just means she'll get a lot of use out of these before her first birthday. I highly recommend these.Update to add: We have loved these so much we have now purchased the next size up so our little one can keep wearing them!

product_title: Leveret Long Sleeve 4-pack Striped Baby Girls Bodysuit 100% Cotton (Size 0-24 Months)
review_body: These are great onesies. The fabric is very nice and they wash like a dream.

product_title: Leveret Long Sleeve 4-pack Striped Baby Girls Bodysuit 100% Cotton (Size 0-24 Months)
review_body: My baby is still too young to fit into these, but I bought them in advance. The colors are very nice and vibrant.

product_title: Rene Rofe Baby Baby-Boys Newborn Fox Short Sleeve Coverall
review_body: Cute but shrunk after one wash! Order a size larger if you want more than one wear.

product_title: Rene Rofe Baby Baby-Boys Newborn Fox Short Sleeve Coverall
review_body: I love this outfit for my baby! I love that it is shortsleeved and footless as his feet never seem to fit right in the footed outfits and the shortsleeved is great because he's a hot-natured baby. The fabric is good quality as is the sewing on the fox. It is so adorable.

product_title: Leveret Footed Boy "Sports Balls" Pajama Sleeper 100% Cotton (Size 6M-5T) (12-18 Months, Green)
review_body: The zipper makes it easy to put on - you know it's important if you have an always-wiggling baby. The fabric is a little thin.

product_title: Bumkins Unisex-baby Newborn Dr. Seuss Thing 2 Short Sleeve Bodysuit
review_body: Color is great.  Fit well.  Only wore a few times before she outgrew it.  Did not fade or fall apart before she was too big for this item.

product_title: Zutano Unisex-Baby Newborn Cozie Fleece Bootie
review_body: These shoes are great!  The stay on all day long and are very easy for my baby to crawl in.

product_title: Little Me Baby Boys' Footie
review_body: My 9 month old fits just as expected in this wonderful little garment. Great for a quick outfit or PJ's on a cold winter night.

product_title: Little Me Baby Boys' Footie
review_body: These are cute and I have them in different sizes but they shrink quite a bit. Still very cute and warmer after shrinkage.
